episodes.title: Exposing A Cult's $30 Million Propaganda Scheme
episodes.description:
Go to https://ground.news/scott to think critically about the media we consume and get a deeper understanding of the narratives that shape our world. Save 40% on the Ground News unlimited access Vantage plan with my link.

Shen Yun is a successful musical show that tours around the world...but secretly its designed to funnel people into a chinese cult called Falun Gong / Falun Dafa. This cult was started in the 1990s and banned in China shortly after. Its leader came to the USA and has been running it successfully out of New York state ever since...
